item.title: Fixed please remove
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

From JavaDocs:

Thrown to indicate that the IP address of a host could not be determined
Your error is telling you that the host location "p2pcc2.fileave.com" cannot be accessed or is not a valid host.

Read full topic
